name: Handling revoked attestation in Filter and Sort
scenarioId: android/Attestation_Revocation_8/Check_and_update_periodically_all_attestations_revocation_status_125/checkAndUpdatePeriodicallyAllAttestationsRevocationStatus:Handling revoked attestation in Filter and Sort
methodName: Handling revoked attestation in Filter and Sort

testSteps.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user has issued PID attestation to the EUDI Wallet
And internet connectivity is available for connectivity and data transfer capabilities
And the Issuer has included VC status check information in the attestation
Given the EUDI Wallet contains both valid and revoked attestations
When the user applies filters or sorting on the Documents screen
Then the revoked attestations should be handled correctly according to the filter and sort criteria

userStory.storyName: Check and update periodically all attestations revocation status
userStory.displayName: Check and update periodically all attestations revocation status
userStory.narrative:
As an EUDI Wallet,
  I want periodically to check and update the revocation status of all attestations stored in the EUDI Wallet
  so that I can ensure all attestations stored in the EUDI Wallet are valid and can be presented to the Relying Parties

title: Handling revoked attestation in Filter and Sort
